thread.title: BRIEF-Euronet Worldwide Reports Q4 Adjusted EPS Of $1.13

title: BRIEF-Euronet Worldwide Reports Q4 Adjusted EPS Of $1.13
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Euronet Worldwide Inc:
* EURONET WORLDWIDE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.13 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.44 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 16 PERCENT TO $604.6 MILLION * SAYS ‍CURRENTLY EXPECTS ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE FOR Q1 2018 TO BE APPROXIMATELY $0.73​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.12, REVENUE VIEW $609.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.80 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ( Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com )
